title: Production Monitoring, Documentation, and Maintenance Planning
theme: Establishing monitoring, comprehensive documentation, and maintenance workflows to ensure system reliability and knowledge continuity
subtopics: Alerting on SLA breaches and errors
Security audit and penetration testing reports
Knowledge transfer sessions and training materials
Maintenance runbooks and incident response plans
Planning for future feature enhancements and scaling
key_technical_milestones: Monitoring dashboards live and alerting configured
technical_continuity_hooks: Enables smooth handoff to operations teams
Prepares for iterative feature development cycles
